biotools.summary: Tool that annotates 3' untranslated regions (UTR) for a given set of aligned sequencing reads in BAM format, and canonical annotation in GFF or GTF format.

bioschemas.name: peaks2utr
bioschemas.summary: Tool that annotates 3' untranslated regions (UTR) for a given set of aligned sequencing reads in BAM format, and canonical annotation in GFF or GTF format.
